label: Musical Instruments
description: Products and accessories for playing music
intents: Learn to play a musical instrument

subcategories.label: Guitars
subcategories.description: Stringed instruments with a fretted neck and a flat back

subcategories.label: Keyboards
subcategories.description: Musical instruments with a keyboard layout

subcategories.label: Drums
subcategories.description: Percussion instruments played with sticks or hands

subcategories.label: Wind Instruments
subcategories.description: Musical instruments that produce sound by blowing air through a tube

subcategories.description: Musical instruments that don't fit into other categories
